TopicTitle: Electric Orbital Enhancement Device - Fling Your Objects To Orbit

Articles.Content:
Electric Orbital Enhancement Device or EOED

Simple premiss, you take some electricity a LOT of ASAS and you fling your objects to a higher, or lower orbit.

Rules

Stock only parts.

Electric only, no RCS rockets or decoupler propulsion

Must use Hyper Edit to get to an exact 100,000 m (+or-100m) orbit

http://www.kerbaltekaerospace.com/?page=hyperedit

Fling a one man pod with a docking port used for detaching as far out as you can.

You can NOT use decouplers as it would increase your velocity and is prone to cheating.

The rest is up to you.

Points.

Highest apoapsis from 100,000m fling wins the internet...

I got to 437,325m

Edited April 11, 2014 by frizzank
